original_text:
Neon Shapes
Ancora una volta la software house Evoplay è riuscita a progettare e sviluppare una delle slot machine più interessanti del 2021. Quando ci si avvicina a Neon Shapes bisogna farlo con la consapevolezza di non aspettarsi nulla di tradizionale da questa video slot. Nessun rullo, nessuna griglia di gioco predefinita, se non quella sulla quale è lo stesso giocatore che potrà intervenire. Ma in che modo? Praticamente sembra di trovarsi di fronte a una partita di Tetris dove diverse forme devono essere incastrate tra loro, dallo stesso giocatore, per sbloccare delle vincite al gioco. Il tutto affidandosi a un RTP del 96% e a un Jackpot massimo che merita grande attenzione. Scopriamo da vicino le caratteristiche di questa slot che, pur non presentando funzionalità particolari, riesce a offrire massimo intrattenimento con il suo gameplay innovativo.
Caratteristiche e grafica della slot
Descrivere la grafica di questa slot è abbastanza difficile proprio perché è necessario che ogni giocatore dimentichi tutto quello che conosce e sa delle slot machine. Nel momento in cui si avvia questo titolo ci si trova di fronte uno sfondo viola scuro e il classico tabellone di Tetris. Sulla destra appaiono tre forme che dovranno essere incastonate tra loro direttamente sulla “griglia”. La missione del gioco per un giocatore è quella di completare le linee, in verticale e orizzontale, per aumentare i propri punti e ottenere vincite più alte. Per giocare a questa slot bisogna quindi affidarsi alle proprie abilità e riuscire a riempire il contatore sul lato destro del tabellone per poter ruotare le forme e favorire così il completamento di nuove linee. Di solito servono 300 punti abilità per sbloccare la funzionalità che permette di ruotare gli elementi.
È giusto ricordare che i punti abilità assegnati nel caso del posizionamento gli elementi sono 10, mentre liberando e completando una linea il giocatore riceve 100 punti. Durante il gameplay appariranno anche delle forme color oro o arancioni, per un totale di 38 elementi che prevedono pagamenti diversi. Gli elementi ordinari sono quelli che hanno una vincita più bassa, mentre va a salire il punteggio piazzando sia le forme arancioni che quelle oro.
Considerazioni finali sulla slot Neon Shapes
Come abbiamo detto non sono previste delle funzionalità speciali, dei simboli specifici e non assisteremo ai giri dei rulli di una regolare slot machine. Neon Shapes funziona proprio perché offre massima semplicità e la mette al servizio di un gioco che chiama attivamente un player a compiere le proprie mosse. Possiamo definirla una slot concettuale, che si ispira proprio a uno dei giochi più leggendari che siano mai stati proposti. Ti sarebbe mai venuto in mente di giocare a Tetris nella speranza di vincere ricche somme di denaro ad una slot machine? La risposta è no, ma questo è il momento giusto per provare!

raw_translation.response:
Neon Shapes
Once again, software house Evoplay has designed and developed one of the most interesting slot machines of 2021. When approaching Neon Shapes, one must do so with the awareness of not expecting anything traditional from this video slot. No reels, no predefined game grid, except for the one on which the player himself can intervene. But how? It is practically like facing a game of Tetris where different shapes must be fitted together, by the player himself, to unlock game wins. All relying on a 96% RTP and a maximum jackpot that deserves great attention. Let's take a close look at the features of this slot that, even though it does not present particular functionalities, manages to offer maximum entertainment with its innovative gameplay.
Features and graphics of the slot
Describing the graphics of this slot is quite difficult precisely because every player needs to forget everything he knows and knows about slot machines. When this title is started, one finds oneself facing a dark purple background and the classic Tetris board. On the right, three shapes appear that must be fitted together directly on the "grid". The game mission for a player is to complete lines, vertically and horizontally, to increase his points and obtain higher wins. To play this slot, one must therefore rely on one's skills and manage to fill the counter on the right side of the board to be able to rotate the shapes and thus favor the completion of new lines. Usually it takes 300 skill points to unlock the feature that allows you to rotate the elements.
It is worth remembering that the skill points assigned in the case of positioning the elements are 10, while freeing and completing a line the player receives 100 points. During gameplay, gold or orange-colored shapes will also appear, for a total of 38 elements that provide different payouts. The ordinary elements are those that have a lower win, while the score goes up by placing both orange and gold shapes.
Final considerations on the Neon Shapes slot
As we said, no special features are foreseen, no specific symbols, and we will not see the reels spinning of a regular slot machine. Neon Shapes works precisely because it offers maximum simplicity and puts it at the service of a game that actively calls a player to make his own moves. We can define it as a conceptual slot, which is inspired by one of the most legendary games ever proposed. Would you ever have thought of playing Tetris in the hope of winning rich sums of money at a slot machine? The answer is no, but this is the right time to try!

message.content:
Neon Shapes
Once again, software house Evoplay has designed and developed one of the most interesting slot machines of 2021. When approaching Neon Shapes, one must do so with the awareness of not expecting anything traditional from this video slot. No reels, no predefined game grid, except for the one on which the player himself can intervene. But how? It is practically like facing a game of Tetris where different shapes must be fitted together, by the player himself, to unlock game wins. All relying on a 96% RTP and a maximum jackpot that deserves great attention. Let's take a close look at the features of this slot that, even though it does not present particular functionalities, manages to offer maximum entertainment with its innovative gameplay.
Features and graphics of the slot
Describing the graphics of this slot is quite difficult precisely because every player needs to forget everything he knows and knows about slot machines. When this title is started, one finds oneself facing a dark purple background and the classic Tetris board. On the right, three shapes appear that must be fitted together directly on the "grid". The game mission for a player is to complete lines, vertically and horizontally, to increase his points and obtain higher wins. To play this slot, one must therefore rely on one's skills and manage to fill the counter on the right side of the board to be able to rotate the shapes and thus favor the completion of new lines. Usually it takes 300 skill points to unlock the feature that allows you to rotate the elements.
It is worth remembering that the skill points assigned in the case of positioning the elements are 10, while freeing and completing a line the player receives 100 points. During gameplay, gold or orange-colored shapes will also appear, for a total of 38 elements that provide different payouts. The ordinary elements are those that have a lower win, while the score goes up by placing both orange and gold shapes.
Final considerations on the Neon Shapes slot
As we said, no special features are foreseen, no specific symbols, and we will not see the reels spinning of a regular slot machine. Neon Shapes works precisely because it offers maximum simplicity and puts it at the service of a game that actively calls a player to make his own moves. We can define it as a conceptual slot, which is inspired by one of the most legendary games ever proposed. Would you ever have thought of playing Tetris in the hope of winning rich sums of money at a slot machine? The answer is no, but this is the right time to try!

Neon Shapes: A Slot Machine That Shatters Tradition

Once again, the software firm Evoplay has outdone itself in designing and developing one of the most exciting slot machines of 2021. When approaching Neon Shapes, one must be prepared for a departure from the traditional video slot. No reels, no fixed game grid, except for the one on which the player can intervene. But how? It practically feels like a game of Tetris where players must fit various shapes together to unlock game winnings. All while relying on a 96% RTP and a maximum jackpot that demands close attention. Let's take a closer look at the features and graphics of this slot, which, despite not offering any special functionalities, manages to offer maximum entertainment with its innovative gameplay.

Features and Graphics of the Slot

Describing the graphics of this slot is quite difficult precisely because every player needs to forget everything they know about slot machines. When starting this title, you will face a dark purple background and the classic Tetris board. On the right appear three shapes that must be nested together directly on the grid. The player's task is to complete vertical and horizontal lines to increase their points and earn higher winnings. To play this slot machine, one must rely on their own abilities and be able to fill the counter on the right side of the board to rotate the shapes and thereby facilitate the completion of new lines. Usually, it takes 300 skill points to unlock the ability to rotate elements.

Skills points awarded for placing elements are 10, while freeing and completing a line grants the player 100 points. During gameplay, golden or orange shapes will also appear, for a total of 38 elements with different payouts. The regular elements have a lower payout, while the score rises by placing both the orange and gold shapes.

Final Considerations on Neon Shapes

As said, there are no special features, no specific symbols, and we will not witness the reels spinning as in a regular slot machine. However, Neon Shapes works precisely because it offers maximum simplicity and puts it at the service of a game that actively calls upon the player to make their moves. Neon Shapes: A Slot Machine That Shatters Tradition

Once again, the software firm Evoplay has outdone itself in designing and developing one of the most exciting slot machines of 2021. When approaching Neon Shapes, one must be prepared for a departure from the traditional video slot. No reels, no fixed game grid, except for the one on which the player can intervene. But how? It practically feels like a game of Tetris where players must fit various shapes together to unlock game winnings. All while relying on a 96% RTP and a maximum jackpot that demands close attention. Let's take a closer look at the features and graphics of this slot, which, despite not offering any special functionalities, manages to offer maximum entertainment with its innovative gameplay.

Features and Graphics of the Slot

Describing the graphics of this slot is quite difficult precisely because every player needs to forget everything they know about slot machines. When starting this title, you will face a dark purple background and the classic Tetris board. On the right appear three shapes that must be nested together directly on the grid. The player's task is to complete vertical and horizontal lines to increase their points and earn higher winnings. To play this slot machine, one must rely on their own abilities and be able to fill the counter on the right side of the board to rotate the shapes and thereby facilitate the completion of new lines. Usually, it takes 300 skill points to unlock the ability to rotate elements.

Skills points awarded for placing elements are 10, while freeing and completing a line grants the player 100 points. During gameplay, golden or orange shapes will also appear, for a total of 38 elements with different payouts. The regular elements have a lower payout, while the score rises by placing both the orange and gold shapes.

response.headline: Neon Shapes slot game
response.content: Neon Shapes is a 2021 slot machine developed by Evoplay that offers an innovative gameplay experience. Unlike traditional video slots, it does not feature any predefined game grid or reels. Instead, players have to fit different shapes together to unlock game wins. The game relies on a 96% RTP and a maximum jackpot that deserves attention.

response.headline: Gameplay mechanics and design
response.content: Neon Shapes game mechanics require players to use their skills to fit shapes together on a Tetris-like board. The goal is to complete lines, vertically and horizontally, to increase the player's points and obtain higher wins. There are 38 elements in the game, including gold or orange-colored shapes that provide different payouts. The elements give both ordinary and higher win payouts when placed correctly. The game design features a dark purple background and a tetris board with three shapes on the right side of the board. Players can earn 10 skill points per positioning of elements, and 100 points for freeing and completing a line. When a player earns 300 skill points, they unlock the feature that allows them to rotate the elements.

response.headline: Skill-based gameplay
response.content: The Neon Shapes slot game is skill-based, meaning that a player's gaming experience and success depend on their ability to fit shapes together and complete lines. The game calls on the player to use their skills, manage the counter, and rotate the shapes to increase their points and receive higher payouts. It takes some practice to master the skills required to play the game successfully.

response.headline: RTP and jackpot
response.content: Neon Shapes features an RTP of 96%, which is on par with the industry standard. The game also has a maximum jackpot that deserves attention and offers players a chance to win big. The payout percentage and maximum jackpot make the game appealing to players looking for high-paying and exciting slot games.

response.headline: Simplicity vs features
response.content: Although Neon Shapes does not feature any specific symbols or special functionalities, it manages to offer maximum entertainment with its innovative and skill-based gameplay. The game's simplicity is its strength, as it puts the player in control and challenges them to use their skills to win. It is the perfect game for players looking for a break from traditional slots and wanting to try something new. Overall, this is a conceptual slot that offers a unique experience and deserves to be  tried.

Review: Neon Shapes
Once again, software house Evoplay has designed and developed one of the most interesting slot machines of 2021. When approaching Neon Shapes, one must do so with the awareness of not expecting anything traditional from this video slot. No reels, no predefined game grid, except for the one on which the player himself can intervene. But how? It is practically like facing a game of Tetris where different shapes must be fitted together, by the player himself, to unlock game wins. All relying on a 96% RTP and a maximum jackpot that deserves great attention. Let's take a close look at the features of this slot that, even though it does not present particular functionalities, manages to offer maximum entertainment with its innovative gameplay.
Features and graphics of the slot
Describing the graphics of this slot is quite difficult precisely because every player needs to forget everything he knows and knows about slot machines. When this title is started, one finds oneself facing a dark purple background and the classic Tetris board. On the right, three shapes appear that must be fitted together directly on the "grid". The game mission for a player is to complete lines, vertically and horizontally, to increase his points and obtain higher wins. To play this slot, one must therefore rely on one's skills and manage to fill the counter on the right side of the board to be able to rotate the shapes and thus favor the completion of new lines. Usually it takes 300 skill points to unlock the feature that allows you to rotate the elements.
It is worth remembering that the skill points assigned in the case of positioning the elements are 10, while freeing and completing a line the player receives 100 points. During gameplay, gold or orange-colored shapes will also appear, for a total of 38 elements that provide different payouts. The ordinary elements are those that have a lower win, while the score goes up by placing both orange and gold shapes.
Final considerations on the Neon Shapes slot
As we said, no special features are foreseen, no specific symbols, and we will not see the reels spinning of a regular slot machine. Neon Shapes works precisely because it offers maximum simplicity and puts it at the service of a game that actively calls a player to make his own moves. We can define it as a conceptual slot, which is inspired by one of the most legendary games ever proposed. Would you ever have thought of playing Tetris in the hope of winning rich sums of money at a slot machine? The answer is no, but this is the right time to try!

Review:
 
Neon Shapes slot game

Neon Shapes is a 2021 slot machine developed by Evoplay that offers an innovative gameplay experience. Unlike traditional video slots, it does not feature any predefined game grid or reels. Instead, players have to fit different shapes together to unlock game wins. The game relies on a 96% RTP and a maximum jackpot that deserves attention.

Gameplay mechanics and design

Neon Shapes game mechanics require players to use their skills to fit shapes together on a Tetris-like board. The goal is to complete lines, vertically and horizontally, to increase the player's points and obtain higher wins. There are 38 elements in the game, including gold or orange-colored shapes that provide different payouts. The elements give both ordinary and higher win payouts when placed correctly. The game design features a dark purple background and a tetris board with three shapes on the right side of the board. Players can earn 10 skill points per positioning of elements, and 100 points for freeing and completing a line. When a player earns 300 skill points, they unlock the feature that allows them to rotate the elements.

Skill-based gameplay

The Neon Shapes slot game is skill-based, meaning that a player's gaming experience and success depend on their ability to fit shapes together and complete lines. The game calls on the player to use their skills, manage the counter, and rotate the shapes to increase their points and receive higher payouts. It takes some practice to master the skills required to play the game successfully.

RTP and jackpot

Neon Shapes features an RTP of 96%, which is on par with the industry standard. The game also has a maximum jackpot that deserves attention and offers players a chance to win big. The payout percentage and maximum jackpot make the game appealing to players looking for high-paying and exciting slot games.

Simplicity vs features

Although Neon Shapes does not feature any specific symbols or special functionalities, it manages to offer maximum entertainment with its innovative and skill-based gameplay. The game's simplicity is its strength, as it puts the player in control and challenges them to use their skills to win. It is the perfect game for players looking for a break from traditional slots and wanting to try something new. Overall, this is a conceptual slot that offers a unique experience and deserves to be  tried.

Below is a review of the game "Neon Shapes".

Please provide an FAQ:

- 8 questions
- Use simple language and provide practical takeaways.
- Respond with a JSON!
- Use the key "faq" and an array with the keys "question" and "answer". 

Review: Neon Shapes
Once again, software house Evoplay has designed and developed one of the most interesting slot machines of 2021. When approaching Neon Shapes, one must do so with the awareness of not expecting anything traditional from this video slot. No reels, no predefined game grid, except for the one on which the player himself can intervene. But how? It is practically like facing a game of Tetris where different shapes must be fitted together, by the player himself, to unlock game wins. All relying on a 96% RTP and a maximum jackpot that deserves great attention. Let's take a close look at the features of this slot that, even though it does not present particular functionalities, manages to offer maximum entertainment with its innovative gameplay.
Features and graphics of the slot
Describing the graphics of this slot is quite difficult precisely because every player needs to forget everything he knows and knows about slot machines. When this title is started, one finds oneself facing a dark purple background and the classic Tetris board. On the right, three shapes appear that must be fitted together directly on the "grid". The game mission for a player is to complete lines, vertically and horizontally, to increase his points and obtain higher wins. To play this slot, one must therefore rely on one's skills and manage to fill the counter on the right side of the board to be able to rotate the shapes and thus favor the completion of new lines. Usually it takes 300 skill points to unlock the feature that allows you to rotate the elements.
It is worth remembering that the skill points assigned in the case of positioning the elements are 10, while freeing and completing a line the player receives 100 points. During gameplay, gold or orange-colored shapes will also appear, for a total of 38 elements that provide different payouts. The ordinary elements are those that have a lower win, while the score goes up by placing both orange and gold shapes.
Final considerations on the Neon Shapes slot
As we said, no special features are foreseen, no specific symbols, and we will not see the reels spinning of a regular slot machine. Neon Shapes works precisely because it offers maximum simplicity and puts it at the service of a game that actively calls a player to make his own moves. We can define it as a conceptual slot, which is inspired by one of the most legendary games ever proposed. Would you ever have thought of playing Tetris in the hope of winning rich sums of money at a slot machine? The answer is no, but this is the right time to try!

faq.question: What is Neon Shapes?
faq.answer: Neon Shapes is an innovative video slot game by Evoplay that does not have traditional reels or game grids. Players must fit shapes together to unlock game wins.

faq.question: How do I play Neon Shapes?
faq.answer: To play Neon Shapes, you must fit different shapes together to complete lines, vertically and horizontally, to increase your points and obtain higher wins. You must rely on your skills and manage to fill the counter on the right side of the board to be able to rotate the shapes and favor the completion of new lines. Pay attention, because usually it takes 300 skill points to unlock the feature that allows you to rotate the elements.

faq.question: What are skill points in the Neon Shapes game?
faq.answer: The skill points are earned when players position the elements correctly, and they are assigned 10 points per position. Also, the skill points will increase by 100 points when the player frees and completes a line.

faq.question: Is there a Max Jackpot on Neon Shapes?
faq.answer: Yes, Neon Shapes has a maximum jackpot that deserves great attention. The 96% RTP is one of the highest in the market, making this game worth your time.

faq.question: What is the average RTP of Neon Shapes?
faq.answer: The Neon Shapes game has an average RTP of 96%. This is exceptionally high when compared to most slot games in the market.

faq.question: Does Neon Shapes have bonus features?
faq.answer: No, Neon Shapes does not have specific symbols as it relies on the simplicity of the game to create maximum entertainment and allows players to make their own moves.

faq.question: What kind of graphics does Neon Shapes use?
faq.answer: Neon Shapes uses an unconventional dark purple background and a classic Tetris game board. The game's simplicity puts the player in control, making the gameplay very engaging and exciting.

faq.question: How many shapes does Neon Shapes have?
faq.answer: Neon Shapes has a total of 38 elements that provide different payouts, with ordinary and gold or orange-colored shapes.

faq.role: You are an experienced writer in the field of online slot games.

dalle-prompt.response:
Prompt: 

Create a feature image fitting Neon Shapes in a cartoon style. The image should feature a happy Maya warrior with glasses who is fitting the neon shapes together on the Tetris board with skill and accuracy. The warrior should be depicted with bright colors and wearing traditional Maya-inspired clothing and accessories. The background of the image should include a representation of the dark purple background of the game with hints of neon shapes and colors. The image should convey the fun and entertaining gameplay of Neon Shapes and inspire players to try their hand at the game.
dalle-prompt.role: You are an experienced writer in the field of online slot games.

message.content:
Prompt: 

Create a feature image fitting Neon Shapes in a cartoon style. The image should feature a happy Maya warrior with glasses who is fitting the neon shapes together on the Tetris board with skill and accuracy. The warrior should be depicted with bright colors and wearing traditional Maya-inspired clothing and accessories. The background of the image should include a representation of the dark purple background of the game with hints of neon shapes and colors. The image should convey the fun and entertaining gameplay of Neon Shapes and inspire players to try their hand at the game.
